Our Vision: Bring safe, transparent, and AI-powered water management to every industry‚Äîprotecting communities, saving resources, and creating a cleaner tomorrow.

About the Project
This dashboard fuses Industrial IoT sensors and AI-driven analytics for seamless, real-time wastewater monitoring and management.

You‚Äôll explore live data streams, valve statuses and AI-powered event detection‚Äîmaking operations smarter, safer, and future-ready for industrial water treatment.

You
Dashboard Developer
Designed, built, and themed the entire dashboard‚Äîanalytics, widgets, UI, and overall experience.
Pushkar
Machine Learning Engineer
Developed and deployed the ML models for live anomaly detection and automated data insights.
Any Girl
PLC/Automation Specialist
Handled PLC & field integration.
(In truth, we'd love to have any girl here replacing Deepesh, but it was his PLC work!)
Sumit
Team Member
Provided project support‚Äîno major ML/dashboard code, but helped along the way.

üìä Live Sensor Dashboard
Real-time pH, TDS, temperature & turbidity at a glance.
‚ö° AI & ML Analytics
Instant anomaly alerts, safety classification, and trending analytics.
üìù Valve Automation & Control
Track automatic & manual valve actions with smart event logging.
üîí Security & Cloud Reliability
All data is securely hosted & always available.

IIoT Wastewater Intelligence Dashboard
Smarter Waste, Safer Water, Brighter Future

name: function 3
function 4
function 2
Universal Style
format:
<style id="custom-theme">
    /* --- NEON CYBER BLUE-PURPLE-PINK THEME --- */
    /* Base */
    body.nr-dashboard-theme {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #120233 0%, #1a1454 80%, #421484 100%) !important;
        font-family: 'Century Gothic', 'Segoe UI', sans-serif !important;
        color: #efeafd !important;
        background-attachment: fixed !important;
    }

    /* HEADER Bar */
    .nr-dashboard-header,
    .nr-dashboard-toolbar {
        background: linear-gradient(90deg, #321974 70%, #5c2569 100%) !important;
        color: #fff !important;
        border-bottom: 1px solid #7e6fff !important;
        box-shadow: 0 4px 16px #8b5cf655, 0 2px 8px #c26dda33;
    }

    /* SIDEBAR */
    md-sidenav,
    .nr-dashboard-sidebar {
        background: linear-gradient(130deg, #220a43 0%, #361b61 70%, #432883 100%) !important;
        color: #ede8f6 !important;
        border-top-right-radius: 14px;
        border-bottom-right-radius: 14px;
        box-shadow: 2px 0 26px #4cfdfb24;
    }

    /* Sidenav buttons */
    md-sidenav .md-button,
    .nr-dashboard-sidebar .md-button,
    .nr-dashboard-sidebar .md-list-item {
        color: #cabadc !important;
        background: transparent !important;
        border-radius: 8px !important;
        transition: background 0.3s, color 0.2s;
    }

    md-sidenav .md-button:hover,
    .nr-dashboard-sidebar .md-button:hover,
    .nr-dashboard-sidebar .md-list-item:hover {
        background: linear-gradient(90deg, #4323ad 0%, #d367cb 100%) !important;
        color: #fff1fa !important;
    }

    /* Neon Glow for Active Sidebar Tab (robust for all node-red dashboard markup) */
    .nr-dashboard-sidebar .md-button.md-active,
    .nr-dashboard-sidebar .md-list-item.active,
    .nr-dashboard-sidebar .nr-dashboard-sidebar-selected,
    .nr-dashboard-sidebar [aria-selected="true"],
    .nr-dashboard-sidebar .md-list-item[aria-selected="true"],
    .nr-dashboard-sidebar .md-button[aria-selected="true"] {
        background: linear-gradient(90deg, #7f34db 40%, #ea56f8 100%);
        color: #fff0fb !important;
        box-shadow: 0 0 16px 0 #8b5cf666, 0 0 22px 8px #f43fdc99, 0 0 22px 2px #20d7fc66;
        border-radius: 12px !important;
        position: relative;
        z-index: 4;
        transition: box-shadow 0.16s, background 0.18s;
    }

    /* GROUP (Panels) */
    .nr-dashboard-cardpanel,
    .md-card,
    .nr-dashboard-theme md-card,
    .nr-dashboard-group,
    .nr-dashboard-template,
    .nr-dashboard-list,
    .nr-dashboard-text {
        background: linear-gradient(120deg, #261948 70%, #3c2472 120%) !important;
        color: #e0dbff !important;
        border: 1.5px solid #944eea !important;
        border-radius: 16px !important;
        box-shadow: 0 10px 18px #41076514, 0 4px 42px #cd37ff22;
    }

    /* Panel headers */
    .nr-dashboard-group-title,
    .md-title {
        color: #ea56f8 !important;
        font-weight: bold !important;
        background: none !important;
        border-radius: 12px 12px 0 0;
        margin-bottom: 7px !important;
        letter-spacing: 0.03em;
        text-shadow: 0 1px 10px #f43fdc22;
    }

    /* Templates & text */
    .nr-dashboard-text,
    .nr-dashboard-template,
    .nr-dashboard-template p,
    .nr-dashboard-template span {
        color: #e5dbf7 !important;
        background: none !important;
    }

    /* Buttons */
    .md-button,
    .nr-dashboard-button {
        background: linear-gradient(90deg, #5f2fff 70%, #b95cff 100%) !important;
        color: #fff !important;
        border: 2px solid #ea56f8 !important;
        border-radius: 10px !important;
        font-weight: 700 !important;
        transition: background 0.18s, border 0.17s, color 0.18s, box-shadow 0.20s;
        box-shadow: 0 2px 10px #944eea44;
    }

    .md-button:hover,
    .nr-dashboard-button:hover {
        background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ea56f8 40%, #36f9ff 100%) !important;
        color: #fff !important;
        border-color: #36f9ff !important;
    }

    /* Gauges and Charts */
    .nr-dashboard-gauge text,
    .nr-dashboard-chart text {
        fill: #f43fdc !important;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-widget-gauge .nr-dashboard-gauge-donutchart,
    .nr-dashboard-gauge {
        background: #361b61 !important;
        border-radius: 16px !important;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-chart {
        background-color: #261948 !important;
        border-radius: 16px !important;
        box-shadow: 0 2px 20px #d360f329;
    }

    /* Progressbar */
    .nr-dashboard-progressbar .progress {
        background: linear-gradient(90deg, #5df6ff 0%, #f43fdc 100%) !important;
    }

    /* Tables */
    .nr-dashboard-table td,
    .nr-dashboard-table th,
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-table,
    .nr-dashboard-theme .md-table {
        color: #e6d6ff !important;
        background-color: #242054 !important;
        border-color: #734ded !important;
        border-radius: 4px !important;
    }

    /* Highlights */
    .highlight-yellow,
    .highlight-warning {
        color: #faccf9 !important;
        text-shadow: 0 2px 7px #f6b3fc44;
    }

    .highlight-red,
    .highlight-error {
        color: #f43fdc !important;
        text-shadow: 0 2px 8px #ea56f844;
    }

    .highlight-green,
    .highlight-ok {
        color: #36f9ff !important;
        text-shadow: 0 1px 6px #36f9ff33;
    }

    /* Scrollbars */
    ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
        background: #231045 !important;
        border-radius: 8px !important;
    }

    ::-webkit-scrollbar {
        background: #11082a !important;
        width: 9px !important;
    }

    /* Mobile tweaks */
    @media (max-width: 800px) {

        .md-card,
        .nr-dashboard-cardpanel,
        .nr-dashboard-theme md-card,
        .nr-dashboard-group {
            border-radius: 8px !important;
        }

        .nr-dashboard-sidebar,
        md-sidenav {
            border-radius: 0 10px 10px 0 !important;
        }
    }
</style>
